name: ExpandoScape
description:
Manipulate the size of the green gear blocks in order to make your way to seemingly unreachable goals in this unique puzzle-platformer. 

Press UP and DOWN to grow and shrink the green blocks to get to your goal. Press X to jump.

EXPANDOSCAPE features seven challenging stages.

_____________________

If you enjoyed this game, consider its cousins:

  • Shadow Wrangler, a game made with the same engine and another unique puzzle-platforming twist
  • Explobers, a massive Lemmings-inspired game requiring complex coordination between multiple player characters to navigate puzzling level designs
  • Santa Claus's Candy Cane Craze, a puzzle-platformer in which the player grows in size
